# Starlight on the Horizon
## Scripture
"In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth." - Genesis 1:1

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the starry night sky, we are reminded of the vast expanse of God's creation. The stars, like diamonds scattered across the velvet blackness, testify to the infinite power and majesty of our Creator. Just as the stars appear on the horizon at dawn and dusk, guiding us through the transitions of day and night, God's presence guides us through the seasons of our lives. In the stillness of the night, we can reflect on the promise of a new beginning, just as the earth experienced in the beginning. As we ponder the mystery of creation, we are drawn to the One who spoke light into existence.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we behold the starry sky, we are in awe of Your greatness. Help us to remember that You are the Creator of all things, and that Your presence guides us through every season of life. Just as the stars shine bright on the horizon, may Your light shine in our hearts, illuminating our path and guiding us towards You. May we always remember that we are part of a much larger story, one that began with Your creative power and continues to unfold with Your guidance and love. Amen.
